original_title: Reiki: The Power of Touch & The Art of the Healing Hand - A Day at the Spa Collection
overview: Reiki translates from Japanese as "universal life force" and it evokes the flow of positive energy in all living beings. Discover the principles of Reiki and learn how to use the force of Reiki for your own benefit and the well-being.
title: Reiki: The Power of Touch & The Art of the Healing Hand - A Day at the Spa Collection
